title: Bionic.Commando.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Bionic.Commando.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Year: 2009
Publication Type: RePack | RG Mechanics
Tablet: Not required
Language:  RUS,  ENG, Multi9
Language:  ENG

Description: 

A special military unit, which consisted of Nathan Spencer, 
following the successful completion of the last mission was recognized 
by the Government is too dangerous. Legendary fighter was arrested and 
sentenced to death ... However, the fateful day some terrorist group 
set in motion a powerful experimental weapons, calling in a terrible 
earthquake, which turned the building in ruins and destroyed much of 
the population. Ministers in a panic: the goal of terrorists is not known, 
the ruined city under their control. The government was forced to temper 
justice with mercy, and bringing the hero of an apology, give him a task 
to rectify the situation.


System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP  (SP3), Windows Vista  (SP2), Windows 7  (SP1) 
Processor: Intel  Core  2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD  Athlon  X2 5200 + 
Memory: 1.5 GB 
Video: Nvidia  GeForce  7800 GTX or ATI  Radeon  X1900 512 MB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX  9.0 
Free disk space: 7.5 GB
Starting: Install and play.

Repack Features
